CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Port Authority relative to Zenith Logistics?
SRP.A: Azure Port Authority is {below} Zenith Logistics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Port of Silverhaven relative to Borealis Shipping Co.?
SRP.A: Port of Silverhaven is {below} Borealis Shipping Co. in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Logistics relative to Port of Silverhaven?
SRP.A: Zenith Logistics is {below} Port of Silverhaven in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Logistics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Port Authority}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Shipping Co.'s minimum Agricultural Exports in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Shipping Co.'s minimum Agricultural Exports is in {1993}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Port of Silverhaven's minimum Agricultural Exports in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Port of Silverhaven's minimum Agricultural Exports is in {1976}.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1978, was the average total Agricultural Exports higher or lower than between 1978 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total agricultural exports between 1976 and 1978 was {lower} than between 1978 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1984, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1980 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1980 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1997, was the average total Agricultural Exports higher or lower than between 1986 and 1989?
NC.A: The average total agricultural exports between 1996 and 1997 was {higher} than between 1986 and 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1980, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1976 and 1980 was {smaller} than between 1977 and 1986.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Zenith Logistics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Zenith Logistics and Borealis Shipping Co. first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Zenith Logistics and Borealis Shipping Co. first exchanged leading positions in {1976}.
